snippet: Where it’s allowed, beach driving can be a great way to get you and your gear to some great out-of-the-way spots.Here are a few tips to avoid getting stuck.
abstract: Where it’s allowed, beach driving can be a great way to get you and your gear to some great out-of-the-way spots.Here are a few tips to avoid getting stuck.

headline.main: If You Drive on the Beach, Reduce the Air in Your Tires
